entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Haliburton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:17 p.m. EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few showers. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with a few showers. Amount 5 mm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 then light early this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Showers at times heavy. High 14.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind becoming southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 in the morning then southwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High 14. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy ending in the evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm early in the evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h overnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023
